original flight Munich autobooked replacement flight Salzburg When asking robot BA call centre booked u replacement flight location 135km apart couldnt understand frustration Eventually someone able book u onto flight following day 1700 Not ideal Id wasted valuable day work hotel wouldnt refund u move booking least going Munich not Salzburg The day new flight came round time managed get way check desk Upon arriving check desk told rebooked flight cancelled 4 minute earlier No email No text No notification ever arrived BA tell u flight cancelled Incomprehensible could possibly happened The not pleasant experience We eventually arrive Munich despite asking didnt get push chairstroller delivered front plane The plane characteristically BA dumping ground used give sanitising wipe could ReviewBody: Mumbai Seattle via London Heathrow I dont know I chose fly BA sense nostalgia I think Going India time I decided go east via LHR BA seemed good idea I not I specifically booked flight BA avoid issue transition carrier eg pick baggage en route THe non BA flight arranged I discovered subsequently nonpartnered airline no instruction PNRs trying find PNR order get boarding pas adventure BA checkin staff kept referring next leg flight We cant give boarding pas not BA partnered airline But BA booking Blank look total nonhelpfulness Try Heathrow I eventually phoned got PNR checked boarding pas Similarly way back no instruction point BA wanted confirm bag Mumbai getting LHR flight When I got gate BA staff pulled side castigated not confirming bag The fact noone told seemed lost Essentially despite BA travel agent seems customer responsibility know The flight not bad fairly empty business class staff accordingly attentive aside fact never first meal choice On way back forget Firstly no overhead luggage space filled BA stuff wasnt airline use front row 11 When I asked shift I met resentful suggestion I could find space elsewhere plane I pretty firm polite point paid business class I not expect go searching space gear seat I wanted shift gear provide convenient overhead baggage space Done bad grace They essentially ignored rest flight overnight request cup tea I skipped dinner sleep took 20 min The breakfast truly awful one worst airline meal I ever The seat tight I endorse concern 242 configuration Im 6 ft 5 keep fit Im not fat I flown around world multiple business seat BA version honestly worst uncomfortable Yes flat short tight lumpy Lufthansa Ethihad Emirates Singapore EVA Thai Cathay Pacific much better even Delta American Airlines international ReviewHeader: quality British Airways certainly gone downhill
ReviewBody: The quality British Airways certainly gone downhill On short haul London Heathrow Rome nothing easyjet Online check quick easy terminal 5 delight however online check available 24 hour departure unlike easyjet allows check 30 day prior departure That good part journey We boarded packed old 767 decaying middle seat E narrow impossible get seat flight We row 13 Without notice go deicing meant 45min delay service however catch 35mins Our inbound flight newer A319 better seat skymap Due slot restriction Rome London flight also delayed During flight new buy board poorly done taking forever limited range overpriced product I therefore conclude airline one 10 month ago offering meal short haul flight well always time nothing low cost carrier older plane useless service What shame

ReviewHeader: would I fly BA First No
ReviewBody: In September 2016 I flew British Airways First London Kuala Lumpur flight BA0033 Initial impression positive The checkin efficient polite friendly staff The Concorde Room nice place My First suite 2A offered good amount comfort space privacy Fast forward 12 hour Would I fly British Airways First No Would I fly British Airways No This On flight two member cabin crew First cabin 8 passenger The 1st cabin crew member polite professional The 2nd cabin crew member extremely unprofessional The supplied headphone set faulty not work I ask twice replacement set It took 40 minute receive Once airborne I ordered cappuccino I ask three time wait 50 minute arrive There multiple issue dinner I second person order dinner yet last person served It took 2 hour get dinner Someone ordered got dinner option I told 30 minute placing order one option available It would appear passenger higher Executive Club membership therefore given choice main course I given option Club World main course delayed I initially given wrong order This delay service detriment sleeping plan I extremely disappointed service 2nd cabin crew member There issue breakfast Despite first passenger wake order breakfast another passenger served first given breakfast I ordered Cappuccino 2nd cabin crew member ignored order When I enquired 40 minute I placed order I told seat belt sign therefore I could not I extremely disappointed material time I placed order time no seat belt sign displayed The First cabin toilet not cleaned properly throughout flight Formal Complaint Within 24 hour landing KUL I wrote formal letter complaint outlining aforementioned issue emailed CEO British Airways Alex Cruz The You First department British Airways confirmed receipt email Subsequently I received generic response British Airways Customer Relations No attempt made address even explore issue gave rise complaint This disappointing I simply offered 10000 Avios point I responded return rejecting offer asked explanation I received poor service flight no attempt made British Airways address issue I outlined formal complaint The response British Airways Customer Relations disappointing not offer explanation matter would dealt internally gesture 10000 Avios point British Airways consistent fair customer I found statement somewhat ironic
